# threadgroupMemoryLength

**Instance Property**

Assigns the per-tile size, in bytes, of the persistent threadgroup memory allocation of this render pass.

## Declaration

```swift
var threadgroupMemoryLength: Int { get set }
```
title: threadgroupMemoryLength
